answers.a: The time it takes for a microcontroller to execute one instruction
answers.b: The time it takes for a microcontroller to turn on
answers.c: The time it takes for a microcontroller to turn off
answers.d: The time it takes for a microcontroller to switch from one task to another

questions.question: How does the clock speed affect the accuracy of the microcontroller's timing functions?

answers.a: The higher the clock speed, the more accurate the timing functions
answers.b: The lower the clock speed, the more accurate the timing functions
answers.c: The accuracy of the timing functions is not affected by the clock speed
answers.d: The accuracy of the timing functions is determined by the type of instructions being executed

questions.question: What is the function of a microcontroller?

answers.a: To process data and execute instructions
answers.b: To provide power to the circuit
answers.c: To control the temperature of the microcontroller

questions.question: How does the CPU clock affect the operations of a microcontroller?

answers.a: It determines the speed at which the instructions are executed
answers.b: It determines the amount of memory available to the microcontroller
answers.c: It determines the size of the microcontroller
answers.d: It determines the type of instructions that can be executed
